title: MediaMTX LXC
textContent:
MediaMTX LXC 
                MediaMTX
                    is a ready-to-use SRT / WebRTC / RTSP / RTMP / LL-HLS media server and media proxy that allows you
                    to
                    read, publish, proxy, record and playback video and audio streams.
                To create a new Proxmox VE MediaMTX LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/mediamtx.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                MediaMTX Interface: NONE Instructions
outerHTML:
MediaMTX LXC

MediaMTX is a ready-to-use SRT / WebRTC / RTSP / RTMP / LL-HLS media server and media proxy that allows you to read, publish, proxy, record and playback video and audio streams.

To create a new Proxmox VE MediaMTX LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/mediamtx.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

MediaMTX Interface: NONE Instructions
